mapper.select: select id, username, real_name, email, tel, sex, avatar, password, home_path, status, del_flag, login_ip, depart_ids, user_identity, login_date, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ums_admin u left join ums_user_role uur on u.id = uur.user_id where uur.role_id = #{roleId}
